code_of_conduct:
Our conference is dedicated to providing a harassment-free conference experience for everyone, regardless of gender, age, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, or religion (or lack thereof).

We do not tolerate harassment of conference participants in any form. Sexual language and imagery is not appropriate for any conference venue, including talks, workshops, parties, Twitter and other online media.

Conference participants violating these rules may be sanctioned or expelled from the conference without a refund at the discretion of the conference organisers.
call_for_sponsors: This is a priceless opportunity to participate in the first big Java and JVM conference in Spain, to promote your company and to support technological communities.
home_page_announcement:
Do not miss the opportunity to participate in this event to immerse yourself in 3-days interesting talks on Java, JVM and open-source technologies.
Talks will held from Monday 19th to Tuesday 20th & Workshops will run on Wednesday 21st until noon.
